delegation_response.description: delegation_responses defines the delegation info of a delegation.

QueryDelegationResponse.title: Query Delegation Response
QueryDelegationResponse.description: QueryDelegationResponse is response type for the Query/Delegation RPC method.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.

delegator_address.description: delegator_address is the encoded address of the delegator.

validator_address.description: validator_address is the encoded address of the validator.

shares.description: shares define the delegation shares received.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Delegation.title: Delegation
cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Delegation.description: Delegation represents the bond with tokens held by an account. It is owned by one delegator, and is associated with the voting power of one validator.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.DelegationRespons.title: Delegation Response
cosmos.staking.v1beta1.DelegationRespons.description: DelegationResponse is equivalent to Delegation except that it contains a balance in addition to shares which is more suitable for client responses.
